alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 12:44PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Elko County through 115 PM PDT... At 1244 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles north of Ryndon to 6 miles east of Tuscarora to 18 miles northeast of Midas. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscarora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
